$id.description: The ID that uniquely identifies the experience within the business

name.description: Display name of the experience (eg in Storm)

countryRestrictions.description: Scope the set of countries for place search.  Will default to United States if no values are provided.

boundingBox.description: Scope all Place Searches to the specified area

verticals.description: Map of field ids to vertical configurations

name.description: Display name of the vertical (eg in Storm)

source.description: The data source for the backend.  Options include KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER, GOOGLE_CSE, BING_CSE, ZENDESK, ALGOLIA, and CUSTOM_SEARCHER

verticalIntents.description: Configuration to boost relevance of a vertical

boostingIntents.description: Intent phrases that, when present in the user's query, provide a boost to the designated vertical

phrase.description: The phrase that triggers the boost when present anywhere in the user's query

blacklistedIntents.description: If found, prevent a vertical from showing up

requireIntent.description: Only show this vertical if an intent is detected

entityTypes.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. API names of the entity ids allowed in this vertical

savedSearchId.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. Saved search to restrict results to

dynamicRerank.description: Controls dynamic reranking of results based on user engagement. Only available for KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER verticals with FAQ entity type.

target.description: Which user action to optimize for. Options include “CLICKS”.

sortBys.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. Specification for how results should be ordered

field.description: If the type is FIELD, the field to sort on

searchableFields.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. Map of field api names to field configurations.

textSearch.description: Whether this field can be used in fulltext search

documentSearch.description: Whether this field can be used in document search

facet.description: Whether this field can be used to facet

staticFilter.description: Whether this field can be used to statically filter

typeaheadFilter.description: Whether this field can be used in filtersearch

directAnswer.description: Whether this field can be returned as a Direct Answer

nlpFilter.description: Whether this field can be inferred as a filter

sortable.description: Whether this field can be used for sorting

nerType.description: The named entity recognition type for this field.  Options include PERSON_GENERIC, PERSON_SPECIFIC, LOCATION, DATE, EVENTS, NUMBER_RANGE, PRODUCT, HEALTHCARE_PROCEDURE, HEALTHCARE_CONDITION, HEALTHCARE_SPECIALTY, INSTITUTION_BRAND, ROUTINE_BUSINESS_OPERATION, FEE_LIMIT_CHARGE, and PROBLEM

nlpFilterOrder.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. Priority ordering of fields for NLP Filtering

minLocationRadius.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. A minimum location radius override in meters.

apiKey.description: Only valid when source is GOOGLE_CSE

cx.description: Only valid when source is GOOGLE_CSE

useSynonyms.description: Only valid when source is GOOGLE_CSE

directAnswers.description: KNOWLEDGE_MANAGER only. Configuration for various types of direct answers.

featuredSnippets.description: Configuration for featured snippets from any field documentSearch enabled.

predictionMode.description: Whether featured snippets require explicit approval from experience training. Options include “APPROVE_ONLY” and “ALLOW_ALL”.

fieldValues.description: Configuration for field value direct answers from the knowledge graph.

eligibleFields.description: Array of API names for fields that are eligible for field value direct answers.

predictionMode.description: Determines when a field value direct answer is extracted. Options include “CLASSIFIER”, “FIELD_NAME”, and “ONE_ENTITY”.

disablePopularQueries.description: Disables autocomplete prompts from popular queries

hardcodedPrompts.description: Collection of hardcoded autocomplete prompts shown to the user alongside popular query autocomplete prompts on universal search.

timeout.description: Timeout, in milliseconds, given for each vertical within a query.  All verticals completed before the timeout will still be returned even if others haven't.

localizations.description: Map of locale codes to configurations that have i18nable strings overriden

criteria.description: Map of criterion type to value

additionalStopWords.description: Set additional configurable stop words for searches.

items.description: The word to be used as an additional stop word.

additionalSearchablePlaces.description: Add Additional Searchable Places to enable more fine-grained location search. E.g. Add ‘neighborhoods’ to search for neighborhoods

disablePopularQueries.description: Disables autocomplete prompts from popular queries

verticalPromptsOnEmpty.description: Control whether or not prompts return for an empty string for all verticals

popularQueriesBlacklistedTerms.title: Query Suggestions
popularQueriesBlacklistedTerms.description: Terms that should be blacklisted from popular queries

universalPrompts.title: Universal Prompts
universalPrompts.description: Collection of prompts shown to the user on a universal search.

verticalPrompts.title: Vertical Prompts
verticalPrompts.description: Map of vertical key to vertical prompts.

^.*$.description: Collection of prompts shown to the user on a vertical search for a given vertical key.

oneWay.description: A phrase that, when detected, is expanded to include all of the synonyms associated with the phrase.

synonymSet.description: A collection of phrases that, whenever any is present in a user's query, is expanded to include all other terms in the set.

normalization.description: A collection of phrases that, whenever any is present in a user's query, is expanded to include one synonym associated with the phrases.
